author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify several test scripts in the Simulation/Recolocal packages in view of changing Phase2 scenario default to D121 instead of D110

#### PR validation:

Tested all the modified scripts

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-gex196 Modify several test scripts in the Simulation/Recolocal packages in view of changing Phase2 scenario default to D121 instead of D110
